commentBody:
i am unable to look upon Mr. Goodell with anything other than contempt and bewilderment. I mean, really, he has not created anything or demonstrated any exceptional ability of any description. Yet, there he sits, a pliable figurehead for the mega rich owners, and being paid some $40 M a year to be their mouthpiece.

Think about this: how much money must these taxpayer-subsidized owners be raking in, that they could throw $40 M plus to such an unremarkable person as Mr. Goodell?
